resources.string: Either your location is outside of the US or there are connectivity issues.\n\nPlease refresh your location, enter a valid US zip code, enable internet connection, or try again later.
It looks like location sources are disabled. Would you like to enable them or enter your ZIP code?

You have two options to access location-based weather information: using GPS or entering your ZIP code. When using GPS, your location will be automatically updated each time you open the app. Alternatively, if you choose to enter your ZIP code, you will need to manually update your location whenever there is a change.
